channel.title: ExileScape - Dedicated Development
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/edwsl.png[/img]
[u][b]Development Blog.[/b][/u] [url=http://www.exilescape.co.cc/forum]Click me.[/url]
[b]Game Engine.[/b] • Original PI w/ all dupes patched + cleaned source. • Almost no use of process (used only when necessary). • Working shutdown hook + fixed x-log.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
I've been working on this project secretly for a while now, Please give feed back on what you would like to see in the server.
Let's start with some basic information, My name is Daniel I'm 17 years old and that is all you need to know about me. I have taken a blank PI base (Here comes the flame). I know that's a bad chose but I would like to carry on developing this base. My goal isn't to bring back the good old days like most threads here say. I simply want to create a nice stable source with a fair amount of players. I won't be releasing this project to the public my cousin Shane will so be prepared.
What plans have I got in mind? I want the experience rate to be fair not to hard and not to easy I want players to work for there items for example You will need to achieve a high slayer level to gain good items.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]Some features;[/b]
• Thieving system re-done. • Combat system re-done. • Player clipping. • Various training locations. • Great quests to complete. • Mysql integration. • Realistic slayer tasks. • 508 NPC models. • Various dungeons to explore. • 474 Game frame. • 474 Models.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b]- 7th of May 2011 -[/b]
• Fishing successfully added. • Skilling zone is now complete, Most skills work I plan on releasing more skills as we get more players. • Quest cape emote, Small but awesome update.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ybDXw.gif[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fk1rD.gif[/img]
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b] - 8th of May 2011 - [/b]
• I haven't had much time to edit the server today I've been busy working on my bmx, I add a minor features. • All stalls are now thieveable with the correct reward.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6chnu.gif[/img]
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Support us:-)
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xHTuU.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/muijbq.jpg[/img]
More information will be added later.[/center]

item.title: ExileScape - Dedicated Development
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[quote=“Burkey, post:21, topic:393963”]You stole my name for a server name, here are some old Reps I got:

jcrane164 (+10/-72) Burkey (+10/-134) 2 Exile Pk - mscp In topic November 26, 2007, 01:40:06 AM
blitz_9100 (+10/-150) Burkey (+10/-134) 6 great job with the specs - mscp In topic November 25, 2007, 05:09:55 AM[/quote]

2007? + ExilePk isn’t ExileScape.

Read full topic

[/quote]Considering pi skills suck by default I say a lot can be added to those <3[/quote]

This.

Int Bauk:

Looks to me your using Impact.

No it’s not Impact, It’s a blank PI source. There are 2 quest’s at the moment that I’ve added R4D and cook’s assistant If your wondering.

item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

I agree, PI is the new delta of MoparScape, hopefully one day we will turn to a different more powerful framework.

Not only on MoparScape, but on Rune _ Server and Rune Locus, too. Its like a parasite…

Read full topic

item.title: ExileScape - Dedicated Development
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Well, I can’t complain too much with the amount of people using PI which at some point, I hope we move on from. Good luck with the development Dan, I hope this one can make it.

I agree, PI is the new delta of MoparScape, hopefully one day we will turn to a different more powerful framework.

Read full topic

item.title: ExileScape - Dedicated Development
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:393963”][quote author=Xx Weed Xx link=topic=491147.msg3591690#msg3591690 date=1304698492]

Goodluck, let’s hope we see some nice improvements from sanity’s half-assing :).

Thanks Nexus.

Well…sixth time is a charm I guess.

Let’s make this work Dan. I’m sure Jamie and everyone else is probably raging at this point haha. But it’s all good to me. I have those times as well where I just get bored with one thing or another. Or a sense of motivation to do something different. (Like when I wanted to redo combat 0_o…yeah didn’t last long.)

So good luck with this.

Please read the thread, I won’t be releasing this for public use. Once I’ve finished developing I’m gone for good and Shane will take over.
[/quote]That’s the part I don’t understand Dan. Why would you make a server, give it to somebody then leave. 0_o…[/quote]

Shane is my cousin, I think he can run the server better then I can plus I don’t have time for the hole “Look after the server” thing.

Read full topic

item.title: ExileScape - Dedicated Development
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[center]

Development Blog.
Click me.

Game Engine.
• Original PI w/ all dupes patched + cleaned source.
• Almost no use of process (used only when necessary).
• Working shutdown hook + fixed x-log.

I’ve been working on this project secretly for a while now, Please give feed back on what you would like to see in the server.

Let’s start with some basic information, My name is Daniel I’m 17 years old and that is all you need to know about me. I have taken a blank PI base (Here comes the flame). I know that’s a bad chose but I would like to carry on developing this base. My goal isn’t to bring back the good old days like most threads here say. I simply want to create a nice stable source with a fair amount of players. I won’t be releasing this project to the public my cousin Shane will so be prepared.

What plans have I got in mind? I want the experience rate to be fair not to hard and not to easy I want players to work for there items for example You will need to achieve a high slayer level to gain good items.

Some features;

• Thieving system re-done.
• Combat system re-done.
• Player clipping.
• Various training locations.
• Great quests to complete.
• Mysql integration.
• Realistic slayer tasks.
• 508 NPC models.
• Various dungeons to explore.
• 474 Game frame.
• 474 Models.

- 7th of May 2011 -

• Fishing successfully added.
• Skilling zone is now complete, Most skills work I plan on releasing more skills as we get more players.
• Quest cape emote, Small but awesome update.

- 8th of May 2011 -

• I haven’t had much time to edit the server today I’ve been busy working on my bmx, I add a minor features.
• All stalls are now thieveable with the correct reward.

Support us:-)

More information will be added later.[/center]
